class.name: LogisticsFamilyPdu
class.comment: Abstract superclass for logistics PDUs. Section 7.4

class.name: ServiceRequestPdu
class.comment: Service Request PDU shall be used to communicate information associated with one entity requesting a service from another). Section 7.4.2

attribute.name: requestingEntityID
attribute.comment: Entity that is requesting service (see 6.2.28), Section 7.4.2

attribute.name: servicingEntityID
attribute.comment: Entity that is providing the service (see 6.2.28), Section 7.4.2

attribute.name: serviceTypeRequested
attribute.comment: Type of service requested, Section 7.4.2

attribute.name: numberOfSupplyTypes
attribute.comment: How many requested, Section 7.4.2

objectlist.comment: Field shall specify the type of supply and the amount of that supply for the number specified in the numberOfSupplyTypes (see 6.2.85), Section 7.4.2

class.name: ResupplyOfferPdu
class.comment: Information used to communicate the offer of supplies by a supplying entity to a receiving entity. Section 7.4.3

attribute.name: receivingEntityID
attribute.comment: Field identifies the Entity and respective Entity Record ID that is receiving service (see 6.2.28), Section 7.4.3

attribute.name: supplyingEntityID
attribute.comment: Identifies the Entity and respective Entity ID Record that is supplying (see 6.2.28), Section 7.4.3

attribute.name: numberOfSupplyTypes
attribute.comment: How many supplies types are being offered, Section 7.4.3

attribute.name: supplies
attribute.comment: A Reord that Specifies the type of supply and the amount of that supply for each of the supply types in numberOfSupplyTypes (see 6.2.85), Section 7.4.3

class.name: ResupplyReceivedPdu
class.comment: Section 7.4.4. Receipt of supplies is communicated by issuing Resupply Received PDU.

attribute.name: receivingEntityID
attribute.comment: Entity that is receiving service. Shall be represented by Entity Identifier record (see 6.2.28)

attribute.name: supplyingEntityID
attribute.comment: Entity that is supplying. Shall be represented by Entity Identifier record (see 6.2.28)

attribute.name: numberOfSupplyTypes
attribute.comment: How many supplies are taken by receiving entity

attribute.name: supplies
attribute.comment: A Reord that Specifies the type of supply and the amount of that supply for each of the supply types in numberOfSupplyTypes (see 6.2.85), Section 7.4.3

class.name: ResupplyCancelPdu
class.comment: Information used to communicate the offer of supplies by a supplying entity to a receiving entity. Section 7.4.3

attribute.name: receivingEntityID
attribute.comment: Requesting entity, Section 7.4.5

attribute.name: supplyingEntityID
attribute.comment: Supplying entity, Section 7.4.5

class.name: RepairCompletePdu
class.comment: Section 7.4.6. Service Request PDU is received and repair is complete.

attribute.name: receivingEntityID
attribute.comment: Entity that is receiving service. See 6.2.28

attribute.name: repairingEntityID
attribute.comment: Entity that is supplying. See 6.2.28

attribute.name: repair
attribute.comment: Enumeration for type of repair. See 6.2.74

attribute.name: padding4
attribute.comment: padding, number prevents conflict with superclass ivar name

class.name: RepairResponsePdu
class.comment: Section 7.4.7. Sent after repair complete PDU.

attribute.name: receivingEntityID
attribute.comment: Entity that requested repairs. See 6.2.28

attribute.name: repairingEntityID
attribute.comment: Entity that is repairing. See 6.2.28

attribute.name: repairResult
attribute.comment: Result of repair operation
